testcase.name: Userid test
testcase.system-out: Given I open browser "chrome" with url "https://www.amazon.in" and initialize report "LoginReport".passed And i click signin..........................................................passed When i enter valid userid "9891011939"......................................passed And click continue button...................................................passed Then I validate the userid is valid.........................................passed

testcase.name: Forget pwd
testcase.system-out: Given browser "chrome" with url "https://www.amazon.in" is open and report name "ForgetReport".passed And click on signin link....................................................passed And click on help link......................................................passed And click on forget pwd link................................................passed When enter userid "9891011939" to recover pwd...............................passed And enter click button......................................................passed Then message should get.....................................................passed
